name: SimbaQuest for Playdate
description:
Experience the latest Simba type game. 

For use on Panic's Playdate handheld, or the Playdate simulator for Mac and PC.

Please don't pay money for this unless you're rich. I guarantee it's not worth it. 

Art help by Teaceratops
